plugins.name: discord-plugin
plugins.description: Discord integration for AGNT - send messages, manage roles, upload files, and receive messages from Discord channels.
plugins.author: AGNT Team

schema.title: Discord API
schema.description: Interact with Discord to perform various operations such as sending messages, managing roles, and uploading files.

schema.title: Receive Discord Message
schema.description: Listen for incoming Discord messages in a specified channel and trigger workflows.

plugins.name: firecrawl-plugin
plugins.description: Web scraping plugin for AGNT using Firecrawl API - Extract clean markdown or HTML from any webpage.
plugins.author: AGNT Team

schema.title: Firecrawl API
schema.description: Scrape web content using Firecrawl API - extract clean markdown or HTML from any URL.

plugins.name: slack-plugin
plugins.description: Slack integration plugin for AGNT - Send messages, receive messages, manage channels, and interact with Slack workspaces.
plugins.author: AGNT Team

schema.title: Slack API
schema.description: Interact with Slack to perform various operations such as sending messages, uploading files, managing reactions, and more.

schema.title: Receive Slack Message
schema.description: Listen for incoming Slack messages in a specified channel and trigger the workflow when a new message is received.

plugins.name: notion-plugin
plugins.description: Notion integration plugin for AGNT - Search, query databases, create pages, and manage your Notion workspace.
plugins.author: AGNT Team

schema.title: Notion API
schema.description: Interact with Notion - search, query databases, get pages, and create pages.

plugins.name: google-sheets-plugin
plugins.description: Google Sheets integration plugin for AGNT - Monitor new rows, read, write, append, and clear data in Google Sheets.
plugins.author: AGNT Team

schema.title: Google Sheets New Row
schema.description: Listen for new rows added to a specified Google Sheet and trigger the workflow when a new row is detected.

schema.title: Google Sheets API
schema.description: Interact with Google Sheets to read, write, append, or clear data in a spreadsheet.

plugins.name: claude-agent-plugin
plugins.description: Autonomous Claude Agent powered by @anthropic-ai/claude-agent-sdk. This agent can use any available AGNT tools to accomplish complex tasks autonomously.
plugins.author: AGNT Team

schema.title: Claude Agent
schema.description: An autonomous agent that can use tools to accomplish complex tasks.

plugins.name: zapier-plugin
plugins.description: Zapier integration plugin for AGNT - Send data to Zapier webhooks and receive triggers from Zapier.
plugins.author: AGNT Team

schema.title: Zapier Trigger
schema.description: Receive events from 6,000+ apps via Zapier. When something happens in your connected apps (new email, form submission, sale, etc.), this trigger fires your workflow.

schema.title: Zapier Webhook
schema.description: Send data to 6,000+ apps via Zapier webhooks. Trigger actions like sending emails, creating tasks, posting to social media, and more by sending JSON data to your Zap's webhook URL.

plugins.name: bitcoin-price-checker
plugins.description: Retrieve the latest Bitcoin price in USD using the CoinGecko API.
plugins.author: AGNT User

schema.title: Get Bitcoin Price
schema.description: Fetches the current price of Bitcoin (BTC) in USD from the CoinGecko API.

plugins.name: chucknorris-joke-plugin
plugins.description: Fetch random Chuck Norris jokes from the public Chuck Norris API.
plugins.author: AGNT User

schema.title: Get Random Chuck Norris Joke
schema.description: Retrieves a random Chuck Norris joke, optionally filtered by category.

plugins.name: dice-roller-plugin
plugins.description: Rolls dice ranging from d1 to d20 with optional count and modifier.
plugins.author: AGNT User

schema.title: Dice Roller
schema.description: Roll one or more dice (d1â€“d20) and optionally apply a numeric modifier. Returns total and individual roll values.

plugins.description: Dropbox integration plugin for AGNT - Manage files and folders in Dropbox.
plugins.author: AGNT

schema.title: Dropbox API
schema.description: Interact with Dropbox to perform various operations on files and folders.

plugins.description: Retrieves the current price of Ethereum using the CoinGecko API.

schema.description: Interact with GitHub to perform various operations on repositories, issues, pull requests, and more.

plugins.author: AGNT

plugins.name: google-slides-plugin
plugins.description: Google Slides integration plugin for AGNT - Create and manage presentations.
plugins.author: AGNT

schema.title: Google Slides API
schema.description: Perform actions on Google Slides presentations and slides.

plugins.name: openweathermap-api-plugin
plugins.description: Tools for retrieving weather, forecasts, air pollution, and geocoding data from the OpenWeatherMap API.
plugins.author: AGNT User

schema.title: Get Current Weather
schema.description: Fetch current weather conditions by city, coordinates, or ZIP code using OpenWeatherMap Current Weather API.

schema.title: Get 5-Day / 3-Hour Forecast
schema.description: Fetch 5-day forecast data in 3-hour intervals by city, coordinates, or ZIP code using OpenWeatherMap Forecast API.

schema.title: Geocode Location (Direct)
schema.description: Convert a place name to geographic coordinates using OpenWeatherMap Geocoding API (Direct Geocoding).

schema.title: Get Air Pollution (Current)
schema.description: Fetch current air quality and pollutant concentrations by coordinates using OpenWeatherMap Air Pollution API.

plugins.name: stripe-plugin
plugins.description: Stripe integration plugin for AGNT - Create and send invoices with line items.
plugins.author: AGNT

schema.title: Stripe API
schema.description: Create and send a Stripe invoice with support for single or multiple line items.

plugins.author: AGNT

schema.title: X (Twitter) API
schema.description: Interact with Twitter to post tweets, delete tweets, retrieve user tweets, search tweets, and fetch user profiles.

plugins.name: calculator-plugin
plugins.description: Provides arithmetic and scientific expression evaluation.
plugins.author: AGNT User

schema.title: Expression Evaluator
schema.description: Evaluates a mathematical expression and returns the result.

plugins.name: facebook-api-plugin
plugins.description: Interact with the Facebook Graph API to post updates, fetch user/profile/page data, and manage Facebook content.
plugins.author: AGNT User

schema.title: Facebook Post Status
schema.description: Posts a status update to a user's Facebook timeline or page.

schema.title: Facebook Get Profile
schema.description: Fetches the profile data of the authenticated user or a Facebook page.

schema.title: Facebook List Managed Pages
schema.description: Retrieves a list of Facebook pages managed by the authenticated user.

plugins.name: fetch-tool-plugin
plugins.description: A generic fetch tool for making HTTP requests to external APIs or websites.
plugins.author: AGNT User

schema.title: HTTP Fetch Request
schema.description: Fetches data from a provided URL using the specified HTTP method and optional headers or body.

plugins.name: fibonacci-sequence-plugin
plugins.description: Provides utilities to calculate Fibonacci numbers and generate Fibonacci sequences.
plugins.author: AGNT User

schema.title: Calculate Fibonacci Term
schema.description: Calculates the nth Fibonacci number using the selected algorithm.

schema.title: Generate Fibonacci Sequence
schema.description: Generates a list of Fibonacci numbers based on count or maximum value.

plugins.name: list-files-plugin
plugins.description: Lists files in the current directory and provides their metadata.
plugins.author: AGNT User

schema.title: List Files in Directory
schema.description: Lists all files in the current directory with optional filtering and metadata.

plugins.name: random-dice-roller
plugins.description: A utility plugin to simulate rolling dice and flipping coins for games and randomization tasks.
plugins.author: AGNT User

schema.title: Roll Dice
schema.description: Roll a specified number of dice with a custom number of sides and optional modifier.

schema.title: Flip Coin
schema.description: Flip a virtual coin to get Heads or Tails.
